about.title: About
about.content: After a course in building and energy engineering, 42 offered me the opportunity to discover and learn about computers. I'm interested in technologies like Flutter / Dart, Vue.js

download.question: Would you like to download this magnificient CV ?

neocity.content: Realization of urban cross-platform application, via cordova / ionic. Use of Angular for the applications, and Node.js for the API

iota.content: Realization of a PoC on a smart grid (JS/nodeJs) after the IOTA Hackathon at 42. Use of the IOTA network to perform micro-transactions (data and monetary) between the different actors (IoT). Presentation of PoC with IOTA in Amsterdam at the Blockchain Expo Europe 2018

42.content: Followed the curriculum of 42, training in programming. Several projects in C of type recoding ls / printf, recreate a command interpreter. And initiation to web PHP / HTML / CSS (2 weeks of training)

whv.content: Language studies in Australia: discovery of the country and professional experiences (catering, handling, farm)

cepi.content: In charge of project and realization of thermal study (RT 2012), plan and dimensioning Heating, Ventilation, Air-conditioning, and insulation of buildings

cdb.content: Carrying out an energy audit of the industrial process

42sh.title: 42SH
42sh.content: Bash-like shell It's a command-line interpreter

iota.title: SMART GRID / IOTA
iota.content: PoC of a smart grid using the IOTA tangle, and performing micro-transactions between different actors.

gameJam.title: GAME JAM
gameJam.content: Making a game at the gloabal game jam, with Francçois Corbel (Dev / Game Designer), Lucien Coycault (Graphic Designer), Jeff Guerin (Sound Designer), and myself

flutterApp.title: FLUTTER APP
flutterApp.content: Personal project, familiarize myself with the Flutter environment. Developed an application that can record and play sounds...
